level.heading: Abandoned intangible personal property.
level.text: Nothing in §§ 5-119.01 through 5-119.10 and 5-119.12 through 5-119.18 shall be held to require the Property Clerk to make disposition of any abandoned intangible personal property except as provided for in Chapter 1 of Title 41.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-160
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 5-119.01.
